```py
DataFrame.rename(mapper=None, *, index=None, columns=None, axis=None, copy=None, inplace=False, level=None, errors='ignore')
```

```py
>>> df.index
RangeIndex(start=0, stop=3, step=1)
>>> df.rename(index=str).index
Index(['0', '1', '2'], dtype='object') 
```
